field.name: MAP
field.description: System memory remap

enumeratedValue.name: BOOT_LOADER_MODE_IN
enumeratedValue.description: Boot Loader Mode. Interrupt vectors are re-mapped to Boot ROM

enumeratedValue.name: USER_RAM_MODE_INTER
enumeratedValue.description: User RAM Mode. Interrupt vectors are re-mapped to Static RAM

enumeratedValue.name: USER_FLASH_MODE_INT
enumeratedValue.description: User Flash Mode. Interrupt vectors are not re-mapped and reside in Flash

field.name: SSP0_RST_N
field.description: SSP0 reset control

field.name: I2C_RST_N
field.description: I2C reset control

field.name: SSP1_RST_N
field.description: SPISP1 reset control

field.name: MSEL
field.description: Feedback divider value. The division value M is the programmed MSEL value + 1. 00000: Division ratio M = 1 to 11111: Division ratio M = 32

field.name: PSEL
field.description: Post divider ratio P. The division ratio is 2 x P

field.name: LOCK
field.description: PLL lock status

field.name: MSEL
field.description: Feedback divider value. The division value M is the programmed MSEL value + 1. 00000: Division ratio M = 1 to 11111: Division ratio M = 32

field.name: PSEL
field.description: Post divider ratio P. The division ratio is 2 x P

field.name: LOCK
field.description: PLL lock status

field.name: BYPASS
field.description: Bypass system oscillator

enumeratedValue.name: BYPASS_ENABLED_PLL_
enumeratedValue.description: Bypass enabled. PLL input (sys_osc_clk) is fed directly from the XTALIN and XTALOUT pins

field.name: FREQRANGE
field.description: Determines frequency range for Low-power oscillator

field.name: DIVSEL
field.description: Select divider for Fclkana. wdt_osc_clk = Fclkana (2 x (1 + DIVSEL)). 00000: 2 x (1 + DIVSEL) = 2 00001: 2 x (1 + DIVSEL) = 4 to 11111: 2 x (1 + DIVSEL) = 64

field.name: FREQSEL
field.description: Select watchdog oscillator analog output frequency (Fclkana)

field.name: TRIM
field.description: Trim value

field.name: POR
field.description: POR reset status

field.name: EXTRST
field.description: Status of the external RESET pin

field.name: WDT
field.description: Status of the Watchdog reset

field.name: BOD
field.description: Status of the Brown-out detect reset

field.name: SYSRST
field.description: Status of the software system reset. The ARM software reset has the same effect as the hardware reset using the RESET pin

field.name: SEL
field.description: System PLL clock source

register.name: SYSPLLCLKUEN
register.description: System PLL clock source update enable

field.name: ENA
field.description: Enable system PLL clock source update

field.name: SEL
field.description: USB PLL clock source

enumeratedValue.name: IRC_THE_USB_PLL_CLO
enumeratedValue.description: IRC. The USB PLL clock source must be switched to system oscillator for correct USB operation

register.name: USBPLLCLKUEN
register.description: USB PLL clock source update enable

field.name: ENA
field.description: Enable USB PLL clock source update

field.name: SEL
field.description: Clock source for main clock

field.name: ENA
field.description: Enable main clock source update

field.name: DIV
field.description: System AHB clock divider values 0: System clock disabled. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: SYS
field.description: Enables clock for AHB to APB bridge, to the AHB matrix, to the Cortex-M3 FCLK and HCLK, to the SysCon, and to the PMU. This bit is read only

field.name: ROM
field.description: Enables clock for ROM

field.name: RAM
field.description: Enables clock for RAM

field.name: FLASHREG
field.description: Enables clock for flash register interface

field.name: FLASHARRAY
field.description: Enables clock for flash array access

field.name: I2C
field.description: Enables clock for I2C

field.name: GPIO
field.description: Enables clock for GPIO

field.name: CT16B0
field.description: Enables clock for 16-bit counter/timer 0

field.name: CT16B1
field.description: Enables clock for 16-bit counter/timer 1

field.name: CT32B0
field.description: Enables clock for 32-bit counter/timer 0

field.name: CT32B1
field.description: Enables clock for 32-bit counter/timer 1

field.name: SSP
field.description: Enables clock for SSP

field.name: UART
field.description: Enables clock for UART. Note that the UART pins must be configured in the IOCON block before the UART clock can be enabled

field.name: ADC
field.description: Enables clock for ADC

field.name: USB_REG
field.description: Enables clock for USB_REG

field.name: WDT
field.description: Enables clock for WDT

field.name: IOCON
field.description: Enables clock for IO configuration block

field.name: SSP1
field.description: Enables clock for SPISP1

field.name: DIV
field.description: SSP_PCLK clock divider values. 0: Disable SSP0_PCLK. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: DIV
field.description: UART_PCLK clock divider values 0: Disable UART_PCLK. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: DIV
field.description: SSP1_PCLK clock divider values 0: Disable SSP1_PCLK. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: DIV
field.description: ARM trace clock divider values. 0: Disable TRACE_CLK. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: DIV
field.description: SYSTICK clock divider values. 0: Disable SYSTICK timer clock. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: SEL
field.description: USB clock source

field.name: ENA
field.description: Enable USB clock source update

field.name: DIV
field.description: USB clock divider values. 0: Disable USB clock. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: SEL
field.description: WDT clock source

field.name: ENA
field.description: Enable WDT clock source update

field.name: DIV
field.description: WDT clock divider values. 0: Disable WDCLK. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: SEL
field.description: CLKOUT clock source

field.name: ENA
field.description: Enable CLKOUT clock source update

field.name: DIV
field.description: Clock divider values. 0: Disable CLKOUT. 1: Divide by 1. to 255: Divide by 255

field.name: BODRSTLEV
field.description: BOD reset level. Trip values x/y refer to the LPC1300/LPC1300L series

enumeratedValue.name: THE_RESET_ASSERTION_
enumeratedValue.description: The reset assertion threshold voltage is 1.49 V/1.46 V; the reset de-assertion threshold voltage is 1.64 V/1.63 V

enumeratedValue.name: THE_RESET_ASSERTION_
enumeratedValue.description: The reset assertion threshold voltage is -/2.06 V; the reset de-assertion threshold voltage is -/2.15 V

enumeratedValue.name: THE_RESET_ASSERTION_
enumeratedValue.description: The reset assertion threshold voltage is -/2.35 V; the reset de-assertion threshold voltage is -/2.43 V

enumeratedValue.name: THE_RESET_ASSERTION_
enumeratedValue.description: The reset assertion threshold voltage is -/2.63 V; the reset de-assertion threshold voltage is -/2.71 V

field.name: BODINTVAL
field.description: BOD interrupt level. Trip values x/y refer to the LPC1300/LPC1300L series

enumeratedValue.name: THE_INTERRUPT_ASSERT
enumeratedValue.description: The interrupt assertion threshold voltage is 1.69 V/1.65 V; the interrupt de-assertion threshold voltage is 1.84 V/1.8 V

enumeratedValue.name: THE_INTERRUPT_ASSERT
enumeratedValue.description: The interrupt assertion threshold voltage is 2.29 V/2.22 V; the interrupt de-assertion threshold voltage is 2.44 V/2.35 V

enumeratedValue.name: THE_INTERRUPT_ASSERT
enumeratedValue.description: The interrupt assertion threshold voltage is 2.59 V/ 2.52 V; the interrupt de-assertion threshold voltage is 2.74 V/2.66 V

enumeratedValue.name: THE_INTERRUPT_ASSERT
enumeratedValue.description: The interrupt assertion threshold voltage is 2.87 V/2.80 V; the interrupt de-assertion threshold voltage is 2.98 V/2.90 V

field.name: FIXEDVAL0
field.description: Reserved. Always write these bits as 111

field.name: BOD_PD
field.description: BOD power-down control in Deep-sleep mode, see Table 49

field.name: FIXEDVAL1
field.description: Reserved. Always write these bits as 11

field.name: WDTOSC_PD
field.description: Watchdog oscillator power control in Deep-sleep mode, see Table 49

field.name: FIXEDVAL2
field.description: Reserved. Always write these bits as 11111

register.name: PDAWAKECFG
register.description: Power-down states after wake-up from Deep-sleep mode

field.name: IRCOUT_PD
field.description: IRC oscillator output wake-up configuration

field.name: IRC_PD
field.description: IRC oscillator power-down wake-up configuration

field.name: FLASH_PD
field.description: Flash wake-up configuration

field.name: BOD_PD
field.description: BOD wake-up configuration

field.name: ADC_PD
field.description: ADC wake-up configuration

field.description: System oscillator wake-up configuration

field.description: Watchdog oscillator wake-up configuration

field.description: System PLL wake-up configuration

field.name: USBPLL_PD
field.description: USB PLL wake-up configuration

field.name: FIXEDVAL0
field.description: Reserved. Always write this bit as 0

field.name: USBPAD_PD
field.description: USB pad wake-up configuration

field.name: FIXEDVAL1
field.description: Reserved. Always write this bit as 1

field.name: FIXEDVAL2
field.description: Reserved. Always write this bit as 0

field.name: FIXEDVAL3
field.description: Reserved. Always write these bits as 111

field.name: DEVICEID
field.description: Device ID for LPC13xx parts: 0x2C42 502B = LPC1311FHN33 0x2C40 102B = LPC1313FHN33 0x2C40 102B = LPC1313FBD48 0x3D01 402B = LPC1342FHN33 0x3D00 002B = LPC1343FHN33 0x3D00 002B = LPC1343FBD48 0x1816 902B = LPC1311FHN33/01 0x1830 102B = LPC1313FHN33/01 0x1830 102B = LPC1313FBD48/01
